pr_title: Make ContainerConfiguration required when building BuildContext

timeline.bodyText: I wonder if we should keep this?
timeline.author: loosebazooka

replies.bodyText:
Okay. The class is not a public API, so I moved it to the builder and made it private.
FYI, eventually we should remove the entire class and replace it with ContainerBuildPlan. They are basically identical.
replies.author: chanseokoh
